AI-Powered Embryo Selection Success Story

A leading fertility clinic implemented MagnusOS AI embryo grading and saw remarkable improvements in their IVF success rates.

Before MagnusOS

  • Manual embryo grading (subjective)
  • Success rate: 32%
  • Cycle time: 6-8 weeks
  • Embryologist workload: High

After MagnusOS AI

  • AI-powered embryo grading (objective)
  • Success rate: 47% (+15%)
  • Cycle time: 4-5 weeks (-25%)
  • Embryologist workload: Reduced 30%
